      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OculusRiftAxisListener.changed(OculusRiftEvent e)
      react on Event notifyObservers, notifies the HoverInvoker, if the OculusRift-Values are correct for hovering (true = hovering is wanted, false = hovering is not wanted)
